meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with a single cotyledon in its seed.
meanings.sent1: Monocots are plants that start growing from a single seed part.
meanings.sent2: I learned in school that monocots have one seed leaf.
meanings.sent3: The monocots at the garden party were all showing off their single seed leaves.
meanings.sent4: In the field, the monocots stood out with their unique single seed leaf.
meanings.sent5: The farmer easily identified the monocots by their distinct single seed leaf.

meanings.definition: Plants that have parallel-veined leaves and flower parts in multiples of three.
meanings.sent1: Monocots have leaves with lines running straight next to each other.
meanings.sent2: The garden is full of beautiful monocots with parallel-veined leaves.
meanings.sent3: At the botanical garden, the monocots were joking about their parallel-veined leaves.
meanings.sent4: The field of monocots looked like a painting with their parallel-veined leaves.
meanings.sent5: The science class went on a trip to study the monocots with their parallel-veined leaves.
